user_query: I need a business plan for my startup idea. It should include market analysis, financial projections, and a marketing strategy. Can you generate a comprehensive business plan that covers all aspects of starting a successful business?

TaskList.description: Conduct market analysis to understand the target market, industry trends, and competitors.
Generate financial projections including revenue forecasts, expense estimates, and cash flow analysis.
Develop a marketing strategy outlining target audience, marketing channels, and promotional plans.
Compile all the components (market analysis, financial projections, marketing strategy) into a comprehensive business plan document.
